text: John Septimus Roe (8 May 1797–28 May 1878) was a naval officer, explorer, and surveyor.http://adb.anu.edu.au/biography/roe-john-septimus-2600 Roe, John Septimus (1797–1878) He was the first Surveyor-General of Western Australia. He explored the Fitzgerald River in 1848 during an expedition. ==References== ==Other websites== * Roe, John Septimus (1797-1878) * JOHN SEPTIMUS ROE (1797-1878), W.A. SURVEYOR GENERAL & EXPLORER Category:1797 births Category:1878 deaths Category:British explorers
title: John Septimus Roe
